original: 其時曹操率軍直指漢中，打通入蜀門戶，孫權趁機興兵圍攻合肥。天下三分，風波不息；英雄烈士，何須嘆白首？布衣不可輕！
text: At that time, Cao Cao led his army to point directly at Hanzhong and broke into the gate of Shu. Sun Quan took the opportunity to attack Hefei. Three points in the world, the turmoil is endless; heroes and martyrs, why sigh the white head? Commoner can't be light!
